name: Phill and Delphia
description:
Phill and Delphia

Phill and his twin brother, Delphia, have successfully made a time machine, but this accomplishment has made Delphia mad! Join Phill as he tries to stop Delphia from changing the past.

How to play
  • Move with WASD and jump with either W or Space
  • Hold Left Shift to pull and push crates
  • Press W or Space while in the air to double jump or while on a wall to wall jump
  • Press Escape for the pause menu and to restart
  • Damage enemies by jumping on them
  • Press the Continue Button on the bottom right to continue dialogue
Credits
  • Programming and pixel art: Rodrigo Okamoto (I'm not an artist)
  • Character portraits: Andrick Dominguez
  • Sound effects with sfxr

Special thanks to my friends Andrick, Paul, Sam, and Jeremiah for helping me with the brainstorming and level design!
